statements: DELETE FROM inventory_tracking WHERE price < 1000 AND quantity > 10;

DELETE FROM barcodes WHERE id = 100 AND barcode = 'ABC123';

DELETE FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND quantity < 10;
